content: > **this pattern is available for free as a 12-week photo-tutorial crochet-along here 1 on my blog** > > please note that the paid pdf is an **english written-only us version** of the pattern it contains only a few photos that i have deemed essential for the execution of the blanket it also contains **round-by-round charts** by the talented masako kawahara > > **this pdf also includes ** > * an appendix for the pink charlie colourway with instructions for the three bonus rounds > * a colouring-in template for the blanket to help you plan colour placement > * a colours per round template to help you record your colours per round if you are using more than three colours > * links to the video tutorial the photo tutorials for each part and the online community that has grown around charlotte > > as a further aid you will also receive a **special stitches and techniques pdf** with photo tutorials for all the special stitches and techniques described in the written-only pdf charlotte s universe is a 12-week crochet-along that started on the 1st of august 2021 it is a continuous square blanket with a lot of floral/lace detail **instructions** the pattern is presented as a free 12-week photo tutorial with charts by masako kawahara and videos by esther dijkstra after many requests i have now also added a **paid** written-only pdf version of the pattern **materials** we have created three official colourways but you are of course welcome to use whatever hook/yarn combination you desire a colouring in template is provided to help you decide on colour placement two of the colourways vintage and sunshine use a 4mm hook and scheepjes softfun aquarel/denim the third colourway pink charlie uses a 3 5mm hook and scheepjes woolly whirl/whirlette yarn packs for those are available in my wool warehouse shop 2 **difficulty** intermediate - *although this is an advanced pattern it has been specifically written for adventurous beginners* **size** vintage and sunshine 160cm 63 pink charlie 130cm 51 **related charlotte patterns** * charlotte s dream 3 * charlotte s sunshine baby 4 **online groups** *join the colourful cals/kals ravelry thread 5 *join the facebook group 6 i hope that you will thoroughly enjoy this pattern and the wonderful journey it will take you on even during the frustrating bits if you need any help along the way don t hesitate to ask dedri 1 https //lookatwhatimade net/crafts/yarn/crochet/charlottes-universe-cal2021/charlottes-universe-cal-2021/ 2 https //www woolwarehouse co uk/lookatwhatimade 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/charlottes-dream-blanket 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/charlottes-sunshine-baby 5 https //www ravelry com/discuss/colourful-cals-kals--projects-group/4138651/ 6 https //www facebook com/groups/lookatwhatimade
